feed.title: I'm Wang Wei, a web-developer-in-progress, still loves C++

entry.title: bootstrap...
entry.content:
Hello, this post marks the beginning of my shifting to web development.

The making of this blog has been part of my efforts to become an indie developer. I am kind of idealistic enough to believe in remote work.

For web development, Ruby on Rails is of particular interest. It’s neat. The community is extremely active and vibrant. I guess I’ll start from here, see how it goes.
